data.comment: The first-half is under way at Renato Dall'Ara - Atalanta kick-off to start the match.
Can Atalanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bologna's half?
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Daniele Chiffi signals a throw-in for Atalanta, close to Bologna's area.
Daniele Chiffi signals a Atalanta throw-in in Bologna's half.
In the minute 7, Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
Free kick Bologna.
Throw-in high up the field for Bologna in Bologna.
In the minute 10, Bologna push forward at Renato Dall'Ara and Musa Barrow gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atalanta defence.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
Daniele Chiffi awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Bologna.
In the minute 16, Atalanta pushes forward through Josip Ilicic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 18, Atalanta's Robin Gosens has been booked in Bologna.
Throw-in Atalanta.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 21, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Atalanta.
Goal! Luis Muriel gives Atalanta the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 0-1.
Goal! Luis Muriel extends Atalanta's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hans Hateboer gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atalanta.
Josip Ilicic for Atalanta drives towards goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bologna to take a throw-in in Atalanta territory.
In the minute 28, Atalanta's Josip Ilicic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bologna defender.
Bologna have a dangerous throw-in.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Bologna.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Bologna.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Bologna Atalanta drive forward through Matteo Pessina. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Bologna.
Bologna to take a throw-in in Atalanta territory.
Jose Luis Palomino is on a sub for Rafael Toloi for Atalanta.
In the minute 37, In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Josip Ilicic of Atalanta is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Bologna.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
Daniele Chiffi signals a Bologna throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
In the minute 41, Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
Atalanta's Robin Gosens gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Atalanta.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bologna.
Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Bologna drives forward and Emanuel Vignato gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Bologna with the kick-off.
Bologna needs to be cautious. Atalanta have an attacking throw-in.
The away team have replaced Josip Ilicic with Aleksey Miranchuk. This is the second substitution made today by Gian Piero Gasperini.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Daniele Chiffi signals a Atalanta throw-in in Bologna's half.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
In the minute 50, Atalanta's Luis Muriel gets in a shot on goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Throw-in for Atalanta close to the penalty box.
In the minute 55, Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniele Chiffi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Berat Djimsiti (Atalanta) has received a yellow card from Daniele Chiffi.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 62, Musa Barrow for Bologna gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Daniele Chiffi awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 63, Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gian Piero Gasperini is making the team's third substitution at Renato Dall'Ara with Duvan Zapata replacing Luis Muriel.
In the minute 65, The home team replace Andri Fannar Baldursson with Mattias Svanberg.
Riccardo Orsolini is replacing Musa Barrow for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Throw-in high up the field for Atalanta in Bologna.
In the minute 67, In Bologna Atalanta's Duvan Zapata is caught offside.
Bologna have a goal kick.
Mattias Svanberg for Bologna drives towards goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 71, Duvan Zapata (Atalanta) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick Bologna.
Bologna have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Bologna close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 73, Goal! Takehiro Tomiyasu pulls one back for Bologna to make it 1-2.
Riccardo Orsolini instrumental with a fine assist.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
In the minute 76, Cristian Romero of Atalanta gets in a strike, but is off target.
Daniele Chiffi awards Bologna a goal kick.
Sinisa Mihajlovic (Bologna) is making a third substitution, with Nicolas Dominguez replacing Jerdy Schouten.
In the minute 77, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Mitchell Dijks for Bologna who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Mitchell Dijks, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Nehuen Paz is the substitute for Bologna.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 79, Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Bologna.
In Bologna, Riccardo Orsolini of Bologna is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 81, Riccardo Orsolini (Bologna) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
Nehuen Paz scores with his head for Bologna to level the match at 2-2.
In the minute 82, Great play from Rodrigo Palacio to set up the goal.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 84, Rodrigo Palacio for Bologna has been booked by Daniele Chiffi and receives a first yellow card.
Ruslan Malinovskyi is replacing Remo Freuler for the away team.
In the minute 85, Can Atalanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bologna's half?
Atalanta make their fifth substitution with Johan Mojica replacing Robin Gosens.
Bologna have a goal kick.
At Renato Dall'Ara, Angelo Da Costa has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 87, Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Bologna.
Free kick for Bologna in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 89, Atalanta needs to be cautious. Bologna have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Atalanta goal kick.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Atalanta drive upfield and Ruslan Malinovskyi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bologna defender.
Bologna's Roberto Soriano breaks free at Renato Dall'Ara. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Atalanta at Renato Dall'Ara.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-2.
